query.statement:
WITH RECV_TBL(PSNO, BUMO, DEPT, LEVEL) AS ( SELECT T2.PSNO , T1.BUMO , T2.DEPT , 1 AS LEVEL FROM SAPHEE.ZHRT011 T1 , SAPHEE.ZHRT001 T2 WHERE T1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND T1.MANDT = T2.MANDT AND T1.DEPT = T2.DEPT UNION ALL SELECT T1.PSNO , T2.BUMO AS BUMO , T1.DEPT , LEVEL+1 AS LEVEL FROM RECV_TBL AS T1 , SAPHEE.ZHRT011 T2 WHERE T2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND T1.BUMO = T2.DEPT )
SELECT T1.LEVEL , T1.BUMO , SUBSTR(T1.PSNO,2,8) AS PSNO , T2.DPT1_N, T2.DEPT_N FROM RECV_TBL T1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZHRT001 T2 ON T1.PSNO = T2.PSNO AND T2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZUSERF T3 ON SUBSTR(T1.PSNO, 2, 8) = T3.USERNUMB AND T3.MANDT = #G_MANDT# WHERE ( (T1.BUMO != '00000000' AND T1.BUMO != '0000000000' AND T1.BUMO IN ('A0000048')) ) AND T2.LEAV = '00000000' AND T3.USERNUMB = #G_USER_ID#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
